I know Torrentzone says "No RARs" but these are indeed RARs.  They decompress just fine, though; no problems.
The codecs are common ones; the avi file played fine on my Samsung DVD player that has a usb port.
currently the server that uploads her is having issues so unraring with this server is not available till next month
